name: Sybil is Haunted
description:
(This game deals with sensitive subjects. Be careful.)


This game is not a straightforward experience.

Depending how you treat Sybil, and what adventures you take her on, your ending will be different.

In this game you wander the detailed confines of Sybil's room and search for each ending. You'll have to play mini games, make choices, converse with Sybil, and watch the horrors unfold.
Try and help her the best you can.

Check the light switch to see what endings you've got so far.


5 endings total.


Controls

WASD - Walk

Z - Interact

X - Cancel

F4 - Fullscreen
